sugawara:personRoleA: Qudrat Allah Bibi b. 'Abd al-Wahid Akhund
schema:abstract: 29, Debt(madyun) and Receipt, Shawwal 12, 1364(Sept.20, 1945), issued by Qudrat Allah Bibi bint-i 'Abd al-Wahid Akhund of Qazanchi masjid mahalla, to Dhulnun Akhund; Qudrat Allah Bibi received 5600koy of money which had been sent by her son 'Abd al-Majid Khan valad-i Qutluq Akhund in Khotan, and at the same time Qudrat Allah Bibi borrowed 4400koy of money from Dhulnun Akhund.
schema:grant: <KAKENHI> 研究費 (Japan Society for the Promotion of Science)
